opinion.case_name: Fowlkes v. Angelone, Director, Virginia Department of Corrections

opinion:
537 U.S. 944

FOWLKES
v.
ANGELONE, DIRECTOR, VIRGINIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS.

No. 01-10068.

Supreme Court of United States.

October 7, 2002.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE FOURTH CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 4th Cir. Motion of Innocence Project of the National Capital Region et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 22 Fed. Appx. 211.
